desc:
Yuri Katsuki makes his way to the Grand Prix ice skating competition as Japanâ€™s top representative with his eyes on the prize. However, instead of celebrating, Yuri walks away defeated and ready to retire for good. But a run-in with champion Viktor Nikiforov and rising star Yuri Plisetsky ignites a new fire within him. With the two of them close by his side, Yuri will take to the ice once more.

(Source: Funimation)
